title: Detailed info about the response
description: This object contains detailed info about the response.

redirectURL.description: Redirection target URL from the Location response header.

headersSize.description: Total number of bytes from the start of the HTTP response message until (and including) the double CRLF before the body. Set to -1 if the info is not available.

bodySize.description: Size of the received response body in bytes. Set to zero in case of responses coming from the cache (304). Set to -1 if the info is not available.

comment.description: A comment provided by the user or the application.
